title: Nosfell 26-01-2008 Pont Sainte Maxence
description:
Nosfell

Concert 26-01-2008

SP CMC-2 + SP SPSB-8 (bass roll off 108) > MZ-NH700 > Sony Soundforge > Wav

Sorry this time didn&#039;t take the time properly to cut the tracks nor to do a setlist, so it will be up to your own imagination and creation, here are the completely Raw files.

Was hard to tape since I was on the front of the concert with some cardioid mics, had to set the sensibility level to High to get some results, but give that distant feeling.
I also had some trouble with my mini-battery module, the battery inside of it accidentally disconnected while the first track (Gunel) and I only noticed it after a long time (18minutes after the beginning of the show) and since my mics were plugged into the "line in" jack, it didn&#039;t record anything while those minutes, sorry, I&#039;m at least as much upset as you by this.

Thanks again to Nosfell for allowing people freely to tape his great concerts and to the whole band for the great sound and the great performances.
